name: Noriko Awaya
description: {{nihongo|'''Noriko Awaya'''|淡谷 のり子|Awaya Noriko|August 12, 1907<ref name="LarkinGE">{{cite book|title=[[Encyclopedia of Popular Music|The Guinness Encyclopedia of Popular Music]]|editor=[[Colin Larkin (writer)|Colin Larkin]]|publisher=[[Guinness Publishing]]|date=1992|edition=First|isbn=0-85112-939-0|pages=134/5}}</ref> – September 22, 1999|lead=yes}} was a Japanese female [[soprano]] [[chanteuse]] and popular music (''[[ryūkōka]]'') singer. She was dubbed the {{Nihongo|"Queen of Blues"|ブルースの女王|Burūsu no Joō}} in Japan.
